Title: A chickpea genetic variation map based on the sequencing of 3,366 genomes
Abstract: A chickpea genetic variation map based on the sequencing of 3,366 genomes
Download_Instructions: Download data under Wild cicer species SNPs. For phenotypic data; download Phenotypic data file and read sheet 1 to explore the phenotypic data.
